Create and Edit Case Comments 
You can create or edit a case comment from two places: Case Detail pages and Case Edit page.
REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Available in Essentials, Group, Professional, Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions. 
USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
Read on cases, Edit or Create on cases, Modify All on cases, Edit Case Comments, Access Activities
title: Service Cloud Case Management
